title: Sports & Physical Education
body:
Nurturing Athletes of Tomorrow

At Amer Maharaja P.G. College, we believe that sports are an integral part of a student's holistic development. Our physical education department is dedicated to fostering a spirit of teamwork, discipline, and healthy competition among our students. As we move through the 2026 academic year, we continue to upgrade our facilities to meet the standards of excellence.

Our Sports Infrastructure

  • Multipurpose Playground: A sprawling outdoor field for Cricket, Football, and Athletics meet.
  • Indoor Sports Complex: Dedicated facilities for Table Tennis, Carrom, and Chess.
  • Badminton Court: Well-maintained courts for both recreational and competitive play.
  • Gymnasium: A state-of-the-art fitness center equipped with modern strength and cardio machines.

Achievements & Events

Our college takes immense pride in our students' performance at University and State-level competitions. We host the 'Annual Sports Meet' every winter, which is the highlight of our academic calendar, featuring track and field events and inter-departmental tournaments. Outstanding athletes are also provided with specialized coaching and kits to support their journey in professional sports.

Health and Wellness

Beyond competitive sports, we encourage every student to participate in regular physical activity. Yoga and meditation sessions are organized weekly to help students manage stress and maintain mental clarity alongside their academic pursuits.
